quotes.quote: Until you value yourself, you will not value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Your greatest asset is your earning ability. Your greatest resource is your time.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: You can only manage time if you track it right.
quotes.author: Spica’s team

quotes.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Don’t count every hour in the day. Make every hour in the day count.
quotes.author: Alfred Binet

quotes.quote: The essence of self-discipline is to do the important thing rather than the urgent thing.
quotes.author: Barry Werner

quotes.quote: Never leave till tomorrow that which you can do today.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To think too long about doing a thing often becomes its undoing.
quotes.author: Eva Young
